content: bag is worked in 5 separate pieces that are seamed together using a slip_stitch join colors are changed using the tapestry method hold both colors together throughout each row crochet over the color not being used when switching from one color to another work the last pull through with the new color when working from the chart read odd-numbered row from right to left and even-numbered row from left to right finished measurements width 14¾ height 17½ materials premier® yarns home cotton® 85% recyled cotton 15% polyester 2 65 oz/75g 131 yds/120m c1 44-73 green speckle 6 balls c2 38-02 cream 3 balls hooks & notions us size h-8 5 mm or size needed to obtain gauge tapestry needle pair of 5 wide bamboo purse handles skills/techniques used in this pattern chain and single_crochet stitches changing colors using the tapestry crochet method decreasing slip_stitch joining pieces together attaching bamboo handles
